thread.title: Intevac Names Timothy Justyn Executive Vice President of Intevac Photonics

author: cnbc.com
title: Intevac Names Timothy Justyn Executive Vice President of Intevac Photonics
text:
SANTA CLARA, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Intevac, Inc. (NASDAQ: IVAC) today announced that Mr. Timothy Justyn has been named executive vice president and general manager of Intevac Photonics.
Mr. Justyn, 55, has served as the Company’s senior vice president of global operations since February 2015. Previously, Mr. Justyn was vice president, Photonics from October 2008 until February 2015, and was vice president, Thin-film Equipment manufacturing from April 1997 until October 2008. Mr. Justyn joined Intevac at its founding in February 1991 and has served in various other roles in both our Thin-film Equipment and Photonics businesses over the past 27 years. Mr. Justyn holds a BS in chemical engineering from the University of California, Santa Barbara.
“Tim has been an important part of the team since the Company’s founding, and I am very pleased to announce his new role as executive vice president and general manager of our Photonics business,” commented Wendell Blonigan, president and chief executive officer of Intevac. “He brings a wealth of talents and experience to the position, and I can speak for all of the management team here at Intevac, that he will do an excellent job leading Intevac Photonics.”
About Intevac
Intevac was founded in 1991 and has two businesses: Thin-film Equipment and Photonics.
In our Thin-film Equipment business, we are a leader in the design and development of high-productivity, thin-film processing systems. Our production-proven platforms are designed for high-volume manufacturing of substrates with precise thin film properties, such as the hard drive media, display cover panel, and solar photovoltaic markets we serve currently.
In our Photonics business, we are a recognized leading developer of advanced high-sensitivity digital sensors, cameras and systems that primarily serve the defense industry. We are the provider of integrated digital imaging systems for most U.S. military night vision programs.
For more information call 408-986-9888, or visit the Company's website at www.intevac.com .
